InstructionData.Title: ACTEMP
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
define MINTEMP 24 define CTOK 273.15 alias Sensor d0 alias Cooler1 d1 alias Cooler2 d2
alias temperature r0 alias cool r1 alias setpoint r2
add setpoint MINTEMP CTOK
loop: l temperature Sensor Temperature sgt cool temperature setpoint s Cooler1 On cool s Cooler2 On cool yield j loop
